title: BRIEF-Finmeccanica says conditions to close Ansaldo STS sale not entirely met
text:
BRIEF-Finmeccanica says conditions to close Ansaldo STS sale not entirely met Sept 18 
Sept 18 Finmeccanica says: 
* conditions to finalise sale of 40 percent stake in Ansaldo STS to Hitachi have not been entirely met yet 
* Agreement is in positive and advanced stage of completion 
* Issue will not be resolved in time for Oct 1 shareholder meeting Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporitng by Milan newsroom) Trending On Reuters
